title: Nat Vignette
content:
I'm thinking about getting a Nat Vignette (one) tattoo, but I haven't got the font myself. I've already got my selection narrowed down to the glyphs A, H, K & 7 and was wondering if anyone could send me an Illustrator-file with these glyphs in outline.

[aspronaut@hotmail.com](mailto:aspronaut@hotmail.com)

Thanks!
author: ill sans

comments.content: Excuse me for saying so, but would this be a good reason to spring for $25? Or maybe I just have jet-lag... [Click here for my seemingly bright idea](http://web.archive.org/web/20100602130229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/nat-vignette/)

Great idea (even crossed my mind aswell), but as an Illustrator hobbyist with an ordinary dtp-job, I don't really have a whole lot of money to spend on commercial fonts. So if I can get the few glyphs I need I'd be a happy camper (with a nice tattoo ;-) ).
Is the tattoo artist also going to work for free to give you that nice tattoo?

Your avatar would make a better tattoo.  
Tim

<cite>Is the tattoo artist also going to work for free to give you that nice tattoo?<cite></cite></cite>

busted?
Doubt he'll do it for free, so if I could save some money on the font I can get a bigger tattoo ;-)
